name: Out of Sight (SeminiGames)
description:
Short game made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam, with the "Out of Control" theme in mind.

Controls:

  • WSAD to move
  • X to interact
  • Space to skip turns

Nothing can shoot or move inside of your vision.

Assets taken from https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles
